title: Enterprise Asset Transparency Platform Using Blockchain
shortDescription: Enterprise blockchain solution improving asset visibility, trust, and operational efficiency across complex partner ecosystems.
fullDescription: Drove the product vision and delivery of a blockchain-based Enterprise Asset Management initiative aimed at eliminating asset data silos and trust gaps across large enterprises. The platform established a single, shared source of truth for asset lifecycle data, enabling faster decision-making, improved compliance, and reduced operational friction between asset owners, service providers, and partners.
impact: Reduced manual asset reconciliation and dispute resolution efforts by ~30–40%
Improved audit readiness and compliance reporting accuracy across asset lifecycle records
Lowered operational overhead through shared, trusted asset data across stakeholders
Enabled more informed maintenance, refresh, and asset retirement decisions
challenges: Driving adoption of shared asset governance across independent organizations
Demonstrating measurable ROI for emerging blockchain technology
Aligning technical innovation with enterprise operational priorities

title: RTA Transportation Activities Rental System (TARS)
shortDescription: Digital platform streamlining vehicle rental operations and regulatory processes for car rental providers and customers in Dubai.
fullDescription: Led the product strategy and launch of the RTA Transportation Activities Rental System (TARS), an online platform designed to modernize and automate regulatory, contracting, and compliance workflows for the automobile rental sector in Dubai. The system provided end-to-end digital services for rental companies and regulatory stakeholders, enabling electronic smart rental contracts, digital compliance validation, and improved service delivery in line with Dubai’s smart city vision.
impact: Digitized and automated rental contract issuance and compliance workflows for the car rental sector
Enhanced user experience for both rental companies and end customers through streamlined online services
Enabled over 840,000 processed rental transactions and broad industry adoption in the first year
Trained and onboarded nearly 1,000 rental companies onto the digital platform
challenges: Bringing a highly regulated industry onto a fully digital compliance platform
Ensuring robust integration between licensing, inspection, and contract issuance subsystems
Driving large-scale adoption across diverse rental operators

title: TrustYourSupplier (TYS) Supplier Management Platform
shortDescription: Enterprise platform for automated supplier onboarding, compliance, and risk management, improving visibility and operational efficiency across global supply chains.
fullDescription: Led product strategy and delivery for TrustYourSupplier (TYS), a next-generation supplier management platform designed to replace fragmented manual processes with a centralized digital system for supplier onboarding, risk assessment, compliance verification, and lifecycle management. The solution integrated automated workflows, real-time risk insights, and data orchestration to streamline supplier operations for procurement, finance, and compliance teams in global enterprises.
impact: Accelerated supplier onboarding by 50–60% through automated intake and approval workflows
Reduced supplier risk and compliance gaps by integrating real-time validation and fraud detection tools
Improved data completeness and quality with automated verification and deduplication
Enabled cross-functional alignment across procurement, risk, and finance teams with a single source of supplier truth
challenges: Replacing decentralized, spreadsheet-based processes across large enterprise procurement teams
Aligning multiple stakeholders on digital compliance requirements
Ensuring real-time visibility into supplier risk and governance data

title: AccumXChain (Coalesce Network) for NASCO Inc.
shortDescription: Blockchain-enabled distributed ledger platform improving data integrity, interoperability, and secure API-driven enterprise workflows for healthcare supply chain operations.
fullDescription: Led product strategy and delivery for AccumXChain — a distributed blockchain ledger and API ecosystem built on the Coalesce Network — to modernize secure data exchange, traceability, and interoperability across NASCO’s complex healthcare supply chain and partner ecosystem. The platform enabled decentralized data verification, secure open-source API integration, and immutable audit trails across multiple enterprise systems, reducing reconciliation overhead and improving data quality in mission-critical workflows. The solution was designed to support shared data governance between NASCO and external healthcare partners serving large networks of care providers and insurers.
impact: Enabled a secure blockchain-backed shared ledger for enterprise data synchronization across distributed healthcare supply chain systems
Improved trust and auditability of complex partner transactions through cryptographically tamper-evident records
Reduced cross-system reconciliation effort by an estimated 30–45% using shared state and API-driven integrations
Accelerated partner onboarding and data exchange velocity through open-source secure ledger APIs
challenges: Designing a distributed ledger model that interoperates with existing enterprise healthcare systems
Establishing secure cross-organization data governance with external partners
Balancing performance, compliance, and data privacy in regulated healthcare environments

title: LedgerFunding Trade Finance MVP
shortDescription: Blockchain-enabled working capital finance marketplace MVP connecting exporters, suppliers, and funders with transparent, privacy-preserving trade finance solutions.
fullDescription: Directed the requirements analysis, reviewed UI designs, and led a team of 3 developers to deliver an MVP for LedgerFunding’s trade finance platform. The MVP established the foundation for a blockchain-powered working capital financing marketplace that enables businesses to compare real-time funding offers from multiple finance companies, streamline invoice & purchase order financing workflows, and improve transparency, security, and speed of settlement across cross-border trade operations.
impact: Defined end-to-end requirements and product scope for a blockchain-enabled trade finance MVP
Accelerated delivery of working capital financing workflows for suppliers and exporters
Improved data integrity and privacy using enterprise blockchain for funding requests and matched offers
Enabled funder-agnostic selection and comparison of financing solutions, reducing time to capital access
challenges: Balancing MVP scope with core trade finance and blockchain requirements
Designing secure, compliant blockchain data flows for financial instruments
Translating complex trade finance processes into streamlined platform workflows

title: LBG–Wipro Co-Innovation Project
shortDescription: Co-innovation and rapid prototyping initiative delivering emerging-technology solutions for Lloyds Banking Group and global Tier-1 banks.
fullDescription: Led innovation discovery, experimentation, and rapid prototyping as part of the LBG–Wipro Co-Innovation Project, a joint initiative between Lloyds Banking Group (UK) and Wipro’s Financial Services practice. The engagement focused on identifying emerging technologies relevant to banking, translating them into viable product concepts, and delivering working prototypes supported by CXO-ready business cases. Collaborated closely with Lloyds innovation teams, Fortune 500 banking clients, and cross-functional engineers to accelerate idea-to-validation cycles and enable informed investment and product decisions.
impact: Identified and evaluated emerging technologies and fintech startups relevant to core banking, risk, and customer experience
Converted early-stage ideas into validated prototypes through structured ideation and experimentation
Enabled CXO-level stakeholders to make informed investment and product decisions using data-backed business cases
Built innovation capability within client teams through ideation workshops, brown-bag sessions, and hands-on prototyping
challenges: Translating emerging technologies into commercially viable banking use cases
Balancing rapid experimentation with enterprise risk and regulatory constraints
Driving alignment across innovation, technology, and business leadership teams

metrics.prototypesDelivered: Multiple proof-of-concepts across strategic banking domains
metrics.roi: Estimated 3–5x ROI through faster validation, reduced experimentation cost, and better investment decisions
